author: cms-nanoAOD
body:
Second set of NanoAOD updates: e/gamma smearing, Fall17 photon id, LHE particles, b-jet energy regression (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/3888)
PR to master will also arrive quite soon (integration tests for that are still running)
title: NanoAOD for MiniAODv2 - part 2, e/gamma (94ANX)
